mapper.select: select e.ec_doc_no , ec_doc_name , ec_code , ec_writer , ec_title , to_char(ec_enrolldate, 'YYYYMMDD') ec_enrolldate , to_char(ec_compdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ec_compdate , ec_canceldate , (select a.ec_status from approval_path a where ec_turn = (select max(ec_turn) from approval_path ap where e.ec_doc_no = ap.ec_doc_no) and e.ec_doc_no = a.ec_doc_no) from ec_document e where e.ec_status = 'Y' order by ec_enrolldate desc, e.ec_doc_no desc

select e.ec_doc_no , ec_doc_name , ec_code , ec_writer , ec_title , to_char(ec_enrolldate, 'YYYYMMDD') ec_enrolldate , to_char(ec_compdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ec_compdate , ec_canceldate , (select a.ec_status from approval_path a where ec_turn = (select max(ec_turn) from approval_path ap where e.ec_doc_no = ap.ec_doc_no) and e.ec_doc_no = a.ec_doc_no) from ec_document e join approval_path a on(a.ec_doc_no = e.ec_doc_no) where e.ec_status = 'Y' and a.mem_no = ${ mno } order by ec_enrolldate desc, e.ec_doc_no desc

select e.ec_doc_no , e.mem_no , ec_writer , ec_title , ec_cnt , ec_code , e.ec_status , ec_doc_name , ec_enrolldate , ec_canceldate , ec_compdate , ec_file_origin , ec_file_update , dept_name , posi_name from ec_document e join member m on(m.mem_no = e.mem_no) join dept d on(d.dept_no = m.dept_no) join position p on(p.posi_no = m.posi_no) where ec_doc_no = #{ ea.ecDocNo } and ec_status = 'Y'
mapper.update: update ec_document set ec_status = 'N' where ec_doc_no = #{ ea.ecDocNo }
mapper.select: select dept_no , dept_name , (select count(*) from member m where d.dept_no = m.dept_no) count from dept d
select mem_no , mem_name , posi_name , dept_name from member m join position p on(m.posi_no = p.posi_no) join dept d on(m.dept_no = d.dept_no) where m.dept_no = #{memNo}

select e.ec_doc_no , e.mem_no , ec_writer , ec_title , ec_cnt , ec_code , ec_enrolldate , e.ec_status , ec_doc_name , ec_canceldate , ec_compdate , expense_status , account_month , account from ec_document e join expense_form x on(x.ec_doc_no = e.ec_doc_no) where e.ec_doc_no = #{ ea.docNo }
mapper.insert: insert all into ec_document ( ec_doc_no , mem_no , ec_writer , ec_title , ec_cnt , ec_code , ec_enrolldate , ec_status , ec_doc_name ) values ( SEQ_ECNO.NEXTVAL , #{memNo} , #{ecWriter} , #{ecTitle} , #{ecCnt} , #{ecCode} , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{ecDocName} ) into off ( ec_doc_no , off_start , off_end ) values ( SEQ_ECNO.NEXTVAL , to_char(to_date(#{offStart}, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') , to_char(to_date(#{offEnd}, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) select * from dual
mapper.select: select e.ec_doc_no , e.mem_no , ec_writer , ec_title , ec_cnt , ec_code , ec_enrolldate , e.ec_status , ec_doc_name , ec_canceldate , ec_compdate , to_char(to_date(off_start, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') off_start , to_char(to_date(off_end, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') off_end , dept_name , posi_name from ec_document e join off o on(o.ec_doc_no = e.ec_doc_no) join member m on(m.mem_no = e.mem_no) join dept d on(d.dept_no = m.dept_no) join position p on(p.posi_no = m.posi_no) where e.ec_doc_no = #{ ea.docNo }
mapper.insert: insert into approval_path ( approval_path_no , ec_doc_no , mem_no , ec_turn , ec_status ) values ( SEQ_APNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_ECNO.CURRVAL , #{memNo} , #{ecTurn} , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: select approval_path_no , ec_doc_no , a.mem_no , ec_turn , ec_status , ap_enrolldate , dept_name , posi_name , mem_name from approval_path a join member m on(m.mem_no = a.mem_no) join dept d on(d.dept_no = m.dept_no) join position p on(p.posi_no = m.posi_no) where ec_doc_no = #{ ea.docNo }
